text: Ordered via Grab Food. Now I first came across the new double down burger with a helping of Korean spicy instant noodles in an ad and truth be told it looked fantastic. But reality is never quite the same, now you can't go wrong with 2 zinger patties sandwiching anything, unless there isn't really anything in between. I could count the number of noodle strands on both hands, plus the noodles were cold and pretty hard and most of it wasn't in between the chicken patties, there were on top, dropped out onto the package and melded into the gooey mess of cheese and mayo. Stay clear of this or ask them to separate the noodles or better yet save the money and cook some to go with your zinger burger.

Not too busy in the morning. Can have a quiet n peaceful breakfast. Clean environment. Served by Joyce , such a sweet personality, very courteous. Glad that we still have such employees in the F&B line.

I recently visited KFC Bukit Merah, and I have to say, it was an outstanding experience from start to finish. The food was absolutely delicious

The service was equally impressive. The staff were incredibly attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable, making sure that every need was met without being overbearing. It’s clear that customer satisfaction is a top priority here.

On top of the great food and service, the restaurant itself is spotless. The atmosphere is welcoming and clean, which just added to the overall positive experience.

I’m definitely looking forward to returning. The combination of fantastic food, exceptional service, and a clean, inviting environment has made me a loyal customer. Highly recommend! See you again soon! ❤️❤️❤️❤️

Every time I dine at KFac Bukit Merah, I’m always impressed! The service is consistently wonderful, staff are friendly, attentive, and genuinely make you feel welcome. On top of that, the food is amazing every single time. Highly recommend this place if you're looking for great food and excellent service!

I had an amazing experience at KFC! The service was exceptional, with friendly and accommodating staff that made me feel welcome from the moment I walked in. The food was absolutely delicious – crispy, fresh, and full of flavor. Every bite was perfect! The crew went above and beyond to make sure I had everything I needed. Highly recommend this location for a great meal and fantastic service!
